channel.title: Private chat problem
channel.description:
when i log in and out the public chat says everything correctly. EX: Pkman411 has logged out. but when you have this person added to your friends list, if he logs out, it says he logged in. so when you look at it if he logs in really quick it says Pkman411 has logged in Pkman411 has logged in
could someone please help me fix?

item.title: Private chat problem
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Look in your Client.java for your server and client, I had this problem once before, I believe it is Client sided, just search “has logged in” It will display 2 and just change one of them to out and save compile and test it.

Read full topic

item.title: Private chat problem
item.dc:creator: @Pkman411 Pkman411
item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

that is correct but only in private chat

Read full topic

item.title: Private chat problem
item.dc:creator: @coco_zezima coco zezima
item.description:
@coco_zezima wrote:

Explain clearer.
So when someone logs out it says they logged in and when they log in it says they log in?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

when i log in and out the public chat says everything correctly. EX: Pkman411 has logged out.
but when you have this person added to your friends list, if he logs out, it says he logged in. so when you look at it if he logs in really quick it says Pkman411 has logged in
Pkman411 has logged in

could someone please help me fix?
